attributes.action: make it law for all political parties to have to 'honour completley' all manifesto promises once elected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just a simple request, that finally all political parties should be true to thier 'manifesto' when campaigning for office, any elected party reneging on thier commitments after election, being liable to seeking re-election or a'civil lawsuit from members' of the voteing public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
